original_text: Then the Lord came down in the cloud. He came and he stood with Moses. The Lord spoke aloud his own name, the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와께서 구름 가운데에 강림하사 그와 함께 거기 서서 여호와의 이름을 선포하실새

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord came down in the cloud
He came and he stood with Moses
The Lord spoke aloud his own name
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 자신의 이름을 소리 내어 말씀하셨다
